sen.j: 天久米命（あまつくめのみこと）は、日本神話に登場する神 (神道)である。
sen.e: Amatsukume-no-mikoto is a god (Shinto) who appears in Japanese Mythology.
Amatsukume-no-mikoto is a god (Shinto) who appears in Japanese Mythology.
Amatsukume no mikoto is a god (Shinto) who appears in Japanese Mythology.

sen.j: 久米氏の祖神と記される。
sen.e: He is mentioned as an ancestor worshiped as deity of Kume clan.
He is mentioned as an ancestor worshiped as a deity of the Kume clan.
He is mentioned as an ancestor worshiped as a deity of the Kume clan.

sen.j: 日本神話では、『古事記』の天孫降臨の場面にのみ登場する。
sen.e: In Japanese Mythology, he appears only in the scene of tensonkorin (the descent to earth of the grandson of the sun goddess) in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters).
In Japanese Mythology, he appears only in the scene of tensonkorin (the descent to earth of the grandson of the sun goddess) in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters).
In Japanese Mythology, he appears only in the scene of tensonkorin (the descent to earth of the grandson of the sun goddess) in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters).
He does not appear in "Nihonshoki".
He does not appear in "Nihonshoki".
He does not appear in "Nihonshoki."

sen.j: 大伴氏の祖神とされる天忍日命と共に武装してニニギの先導をした。
sen.e: He was armed with Amenooshihi-no-mikoto who is regarded as an ancestor worshiped as deity of Otomo clan, and guided Ninigi.
He was armed with Amenooshihi-no-mikoto who is regarded as an ancestor worshiped as deity of Otomo clan, and guided Ninigi.
He was armed with Amenooshihi no mikoto who is regarded as an ancestor worshiped as deity of Otomo clan, and guided Ninigi.

sen.j: 古事記の天孫降臨の段では天久米命と天忍日命は対等の立場で書かれている。
sen.e: In the section of tensonkorin (the descent to earth of the grandson of the sun goddess) of Kojiki, Amatsukume-no-mikoto and Amenooshihi-no-mikoto are described as on equal footing.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In the section of tensonkorin (the descent to earth of the grandson of the sun goddess) of Kojiki, Amatsukume-no-mikoto and Amenooshihi-no-mikoto are described as on equal footing.
In the section of tensonkorin (the descent to earth of the grandson of the sun goddess) of Kojiki, Amatsukume no mikoto and Amenooshihi no mikoto are described as on equal footing.

sen.j: だが、日本書紀の神武東征の段では、天久米命の子孫の久米部は、天忍日命の子孫である道臣命の部下となっている。
sen.e: But in the section of Jinmu tosei (Eastern expedition of the Emperor Jinmu) of Nihonshoki, Kume-be who was a descendant of Amatsukume-no-mikoto was a subordinate of Michinoomi-no-mikoto who was a descendant of Amenooshihi-no-mikoto.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: But in the section of Jinmu tosei (Eastern expedition of the Emperor Jinmu) of Nihonshoki, Kume-be who was a descendant of Amatsukume-no-mikoto was a subordinate of Michinoomi-no-mikoto who was a descendant of Amenooshihi-no-mikoto.

But in the section of Jinmu tosei (Eastern expedition of the Emperor Jinmu) of Nihonshoki, Kumebe who was a descendant of Amatsukume no mikoto was a subordinate of Michinoomi no mikoto who was a descendant of Amenooshihi no mikoto.
sen.cmt: ハイフン削除スペース削除

sen.j: 天久米命を祀る神社は少ない。
sen.e: There are not very many shrines to enshrine Amatsukume-no-mikoto.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: There are not very many shrines that enshrine Amatsukume-no-mikoto.
There are not very many shrines that enshrine Amatsukume no mikoto.

sen.j: 大和での久米氏の居住地であった現在の奈良県橿原市久米町にある久米御縣神社に祀られている。
sen.e: He is enshrined in Kumenomiagata-jinja Shrine in Kume-cho, Kashihara city, Nara Prefecture, where was the place of residence of Kume clan in Yamato area.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: He is enshrined in Kumenomiagata-jinja Shrine in Kume-cho, Kashihara city, Nara Prefecture, which was the residence of Kume clan in Yamato area.
He is enshrined in Kumenomiagata-jinja Shrine in present-day Kume-cho, Kashihara City, Nara Prefecture, which was the residence of Kume clan in Yamato area.
